SEARCH
Package com.gymmanager.service

Class EnrollmentServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.gymmanager.service.EnrollmentServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnrollmentService
public class EnrollmentServiceImpl extends Object implements EnrollmentService
Implementation of the EnrollmentService interface. Handles the business logic for enrolling members in gym courses, removing members from courses, and retrieving course members.
